*Naturally Occurring Chemical Substances must meet the definition in 40 CFR 710.4(b) (http://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/pkg/CFR-2011-title40-vol31/pdf/CFR-2011-title40-vol31-sec710-4.pdf)

*This CAS RN represents a category of mixtures of aluminum silicate (comprising a lattice framework) and various metal-containing substances that provide counter-ions (such as sodium or potassium cations) for that lattice framework. In such a mixture, the aluminum silicate component might be identified on the TSCA Inventory as "Silicic acid, aluminum salt" (CASRN 1335-30-4) or "Aluminatesilicate" (CASRN 1327-36-2). For TSCA purposes, the elemental composition of the lattice framework of a zeolite is limited to aluminum, silicon, and oxygen atoms.

*This CAS RN represents a category of mixtures of aluminum silicate (comprising a lattice framework) and various metal-containing substances that provide counter-ions (such as sodium or potassium cations) for that lattice framework. In such a mixture, the aluminum silicate component might be identified on the TSCA Inventory as "Silicic acid, aluminum salt" (CASRN 1335-30-4) or "Aluminatesilicate" (CASRN 1327-36-2). For TSCA purposes, the elemental composition of the lattice framework of a zeolite is limited to aluminum, silicon, and oxygen atoms.
